title: Server: Configuration & Environment Management
description:
Set up server configuration management with environment variables, CORS, logging, and error handling.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create `src/config.ts` for configuration management
- [ ] Load environment variables with validation
- [ ] Set up CORS configuration
- [ ] Configure logging (console for now, structured later)
- [ ] Set up error handling middleware
- [ ] Create logger utility
- [ ] Create error classes & middleware

## Files to Create
```
server/src/
├── config.ts             # Configuration management
└── utils/
    ├── logger.ts         # Logging utility
    └── errors.ts         # Error classes & middleware
```

## Configuration to Support
```typescript
interface ServerConfig {
  port: number
  corsOrigins: string[]
  sudocodeDbPath: string
  jsonlPath: string
  logLevel: 'debug' | 'info' | 'warn' | 'error'
}
```

## Verification
- Set environment variables (PORT, CORS_ORIGINS)
- Server should respect these settings
- Error handling should work for invalid requests
- Logs should be formatted properly

## Success Criteria
Configurable server with proper error handling and logging.

Reference: [[server/server_plan.md]] - Phase 1, Step 1.3

title: Server: Database Setup & Schema Implementation
description:
Initialize SQLite database with schema for sudocode server.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create `src/services/db.ts` with database connection
- [ ] Import schema from `../cli/src/schema.ts`
- [ ] Add new tables for projects, issue_attempts, execution_processes
- [ ] Add execution_process_logs table
- [ ] Write database initialization function
- [ ] Add database migration logic
- [ ] Create helper functions for common queries

## Files to Create
```
server/src/
├── services/
│   └── db.ts             # Database connection & init
└── types/
    └── extended.ts       # Extended types (Project, IssueAttempt, etc.)
```

## Schema Additions
- Projects table
- Issue attempts table
- Execution processes table
- Execution process logs table

## Verification
- Run server with `npm run dev`
- Database should be created at `server/sudocode.db`
- All tables should be created successfully
- Can query tables with sqlite3

## Success Criteria
Working SQLite database with all required tables.

Reference: [[server/server_plan.md]] - Phase 1, Step 1.2

title: Server: Project Initialization & Basic Express Setup
description:
Set up the basic TypeScript + Express project structure for the sudocode backend server.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create `server/` directory structure
- [ ] Initialize `package.json` with dependencies (express, typescript, etc.)
- [ ] Create `tsconfig.json` for TypeScript configuration
- [ ] Set up basic Express app in `src/index.ts`
- [ ] Add development scripts (dev, build, start)
- [ ] Create `.env.example` for environment variables
- [ ] Create `.gitignore` with appropriate entries

## Files to Create
```
server/
├── src/
│   └── index.ts          # Basic Express app
├── package.json
├── tsconfig.json
├── .env.example
└── .gitignore
```

## Verification
- Server should start on http://localhost:3001
- GET http://localhost:3001/health should return 200
- `npm run dev` should start the server successfully

## Success Criteria
Express server that starts successfully with a health check endpoint.

Reference: [[server/server_plan.md]] - Phase 1, Step 1.1
